meanings.definition: A large, fast passenger aircraft powered by jet engines.
meanings.sent1: The jetliners soared high above the clouds.
meanings.sent2: We boarded the jetliners for our vacation.
meanings.sent3: The jetliners decided to have a race in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The jetliners were like shooting stars in the night.
meanings.sent5: The roar of the jetliners echoed through the airport.

meanings.definition: The act of traveling by jetliner.
meanings.sent1: I experienced my first jetliners journey last summer.
meanings.sent2: Jetliners have made long-distance travel much faster.
meanings.sent3: The jetliners seemed to dance in the air as they flew.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams took flight on the wings of jetliners.
meanings.sent5: The excitement of jetliners travel is unmatched.
